text: The Wizard of New Zealand (born Ian Brackenbury Channell; 4 December 1932) is a British-born New Zealand educator, comedian, illusionist, and politician. He is also known by his shorter name, The Wizard. In 1990 the Prime Minister of New Zealand, Mike Moore, an old friend, appointed him the official "Wizard of New Zealand". ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Comedians from London Category:Politicians from London Category:People from Christchurch Category:New Zealand educators Category:New Zealand comedians
title: The Wizard of New Zealand
